value.title: Standard Bank employs AWS technology to boost Shari’ah Banking services

value.title: Thaivivat offers AI tech startup, inspection app
value.excerpt: Thaivivat Insurance (TVI) has launched Motor AI Recognition Solution (MARS), a deep tech startup, and MARS Inspect, a real-time vehicle inspection application, aiming to achieve total premiums of 10 billion baht by 2024.

value.title: Amazon launches RPG for AWS training
